title: Bachelor's Degree in Finance/Economics
description: Obtain a high GPA degree from a reputable university. Focus on finance, economics, mathematics, or accounting.

title: Internships & Networking
description: Gain experience through internships at banks or financial firms. Networking is crucial in this industry.

title: Analyst Role
description: Start as an Investment Banking Analyst. Work on financial models, pitch decks, and valuations. Long hours are expected.

title: Associate & MBA
description: Get promoted to Associate. Leading deal execution. Many pursue an MBA at this stage to accelerate career growth.

title: VP / Managing Director
description: Focus on client relationships and bringing in new business (rainmaking). Oversee multiple deal teams.
